page.title: 13CUSTOMS
page.content: These are two of my favourite { {playground games}for {boys. T.V.games is a good game. You have to say what time the programme is on and then its initials_say it was Crystal Tips and Alistair it would be C.A._and then tell them what channel it is on. If they know it they run up to the caller then back again and if they get it right they are it.{Sugar Mouse }is another of my favourites. You have to say a word like "cars" and everyone picks a make. They tell the one who is it and he shouts one out. The ones who chose the make run up and down and when they get back say "Sugar Mouse" and the first one to say it is the caller next time.
